title: GDPR | aSc EduPage
content:
EduPage is not using any marketing, analytics or advertising cookies. No cookies are shared by third parties. EduPage uses only 2 cookies – one for the login purposes, this cookie is deleted once you close your browser. Second cookie increases the security of your login – EduPage uses it to identify logins from unknown devices.

  • Top menu
  • Content
  • Footer

For EduPage, security is a big concern. Learn how EduPage is commited to the GDPR and what you have to do to comply with the law.

  • asc Applied Software Consultants, s.r.o.
    Námestie Slobody 11,
    811 06 Bratislava, Slovakia, EU

    tel. (+421) 2 - 442 52580
    tel. (+421) 2 - 444 50535
    info@asc.sk
